meanings.definition: The main seating area at a sports stadium or arena.
meanings.sent1: The grandstands were filled with cheering fans during the championship game.
meanings.sent2: I sat in the grandstands to watch the baseball game.
meanings.sent3: The grandstands looked like a sea of colorful seats.
meanings.sent4: The grandstands towered over the field like a giant wall of seats.
meanings.sent5: The grandstands provided a great view of the entire stadium.

meanings.definition: To show off or act ostentatiously in order to impress others.
meanings.sent1: He grandstands by bragging about his accomplishments all the time.
meanings.sent2: She always grandstands about her expensive possessions.
meanings.sent3: The peacock grandstands by displaying its vibrant feathers.
meanings.sent4: The politician grandstands to gain more supporters.
meanings.sent5: The actor grandstands on stage to captivate the audience.
